---
title: Native Typst Highlighting
format:
  typst:
    keep-typ: true
    syntax-highlighting: idiomatic
_quarto:
  tests:
    typst:
      ensureTypstFileRegexMatches:
        # idiomatic = native typst highlighting = raw fenced code blocks
        - ["```python"]
        # Should NOT have Skylighting tokens
        - ["#Skylighting", "#KeywordTok", "#StringTok"]
---

Test that `syntax-highlighting: idiomatic` produces native typst highlighting.

```python
def hello():
    print("world")
```
